description: This header file declares internal functions for Http Mbo File Object management, including handling transfer size, appending, copying, saving, and processing HTTP body files within the system.

methods.name: HttpMboFileGetTransferSize
methods.description: Retrieves the transfer size of the HTTP Mbo File Object.

methods.name: HttpMboFileAppendBodyBdo
methods.description: Appends a BDO to the HTTP body.

methods.name: HttpMboFileAppendBodyFile
methods.description: Appends a file with specified range to the HTTP body.

methods.name: HttpMboFileCopyBodyFrom
methods.description: Copies data from a buffer into the HTTP body.

methods.name: HttpMboFileCopyBodyInto
methods.description: Copies data from the HTTP body into a buffer.

methods.name: HttpMboFileSaveAsBody
methods.description: Saves data to the HTTP body from a buffer.

methods.name: HttpMboFileSaveBodyAsFile
methods.description: Saves the HTTP body content into a specified file.

methods.name: HttpMboFileSaveFormAsFile
methods.description: Saves form parameters into a file.

methods.name: HttpMboFileOutput
methods.description: Handles output of the HTTP Mbo File.
